briefTitle: 3 yr Efficacy & Safety Study of Zoledronic Acid in Post-menopausal Women With Osteoporosis Treated With Zol Acid for 6 Yrs
officialTitle: A 3-year, Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Extension to CZOL446H2301E1 to Evaluate the Efficacy and Long Term Safety of 6 and 9 Years Zoledronic Acid Treatment of Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
summary: This second extension will evaluate the efficacy and long term safety of zoledronic acid in women with post-menopausal osteoporosis

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage Change in Total Hip Bone Mineral Density BMD at Year 6 (Baseline) and Year 9
